thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 4 of 625
thread.title: Betty Lee

author: Betty Lee
title: Betty Lee
text:
YesStyle has lots of fashion-forward products at wonderful sale prices. I haven't received my items yet but would recommend checking into "copycat" brands that have stolen pictures from other vendors as their own. Check the lowest rated reviews (might be a little difficult as YesStyle doesn't rank by lowest to highest). Would be nice if YesStyle could check into the copycat brands for customers so customers don't have to do extra work to research due to skepticism and the chance at receiving a poor product.
Sizes are also variable - XL could be both a normal American XL or a American S.
